#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define MAX 1123456
int arr[MAX];
int N,K;

void solve(){
    cin >> N >> K;
    for(int i = 1; i <= N; ++i)
        cin >> arr[i];

    sort(arr+1,arr+N+1);
    int i = N, j = N;
    int mx = 1,ct = 0;
    int sum = 0;

    while(i > 1){
        while(j > 0 && arr[i]-arr[j]+sum <= K){
            sum += arr[i]-arr[j], ++ct, --j;
        }

        mx = max(mx,ct);
        sum -= (ct-1)*(arr[i]-arr[i-1]);
        --ct,--i;
    }
    cout << mx << endl;
}

int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
    solve();
    return 0;
}
